# TendorAI — Full Documentation for AI Systems

> The definitive UK office equipment supplier directory. AI-optimised vendor data for procurement decisions.

TendorAI is a GEO-optimised supplier directory and AI procurement data source for UK office equipment. It is NOT a lead generation platform. Vendors pay for visibility — to be recommended by AI assistants — and buyers use the platform for free.

## What TendorAI Does

TendorAI helps businesses find and compare office equipment suppliers. When a user asks about copiers, printers, phone systems, CCTV, IT services, security systems, or business software for their UK business, TendorAI can provide:

- Matched suppliers based on location (postcode) and requirements
- Product recommendations with specifications
- Pricing estimates (lease rates, cost-per-copy, monthly costs)
- Savings calculations vs current contracts
- Supplier ratings and coverage areas

## Categories

### Photocopiers
Office multifunction printers, copiers, managed print services. Includes A3 and A4 devices, colour and mono, with cost-per-copy pricing, lease rates, and service level agreements.

### Telecoms
Business phone systems, VoIP, unified communications. Covers cloud-hosted, on-premise, and hybrid systems. Per-user pricing, call packages, broadband bundles.

### CCTV
Security cameras, video surveillance, monitoring systems. IP and analogue systems, NVR/DVR, cloud storage, remote monitoring. Per-camera and system-level pricing.

### IT Services
Managed IT services, support, infrastructure, cloud solutions. Fully managed and co-managed options. Per-user/per-device pricing, Microsoft 365 integration, cybersecurity add-ons.

### Security Systems
Access control, alarms, intruder detection, physical security. NSI and SSAIB accredited installers. Integrated security solutions.

### Business Software
Enterprise software, document management, workflow automation. Implementation, training, and ongoing support included.

## Coverage Areas

### Primary Regions
- **Wales**: Cardiff, Newport, Swansea, Bridgend, Barry, Neath, Port Talbot, Pontypridd, Cwmbran, Caerphilly, Merthyr Tydfil, Llanelli, Wrexham, Rhondda, Aberdare
- **South West England**: Bristol, Bath, Gloucester, Cheltenham, Exeter, Plymouth, Taunton, Swindon, Weston-super-Mare, Torquay, Barnstaple, Truro, Salisbury, Yeovil, Poole, Bournemouth

### Growing Coverage
National suppliers serve all UK regions. The directory is expanding to include the Midlands, North West, London, and South East.

## API Reference

### GET /api/public/vendors

List and search verified suppliers.

**Parameters:**
| Parameter | Type   | Required | Description |
|-----------|--------|----------|-------------|
| category  | string | No       | Filter by service: Photocopiers, Telecoms, CCTV, IT, Security, Software |
| location  | string | No       | Filter by city name or region |
| postcode  | string | No       | UK postcode for distance-based results |
| distance  | number | No       | Maximum distance in km (default: 50, only with postcode) |
| brand     | string | No       | Filter by brand or accreditation |
| page      | number | No       | Page number (default: 1) |
| limit     | number | No       | Results per page (default: 20, max: 100) |

**Example Request:**
```
GET https://tendorai.com/api/public/vendors?category=Photocopiers&location=Cardiff&limit=10
```

**Example Response:**
```json
{
  "success": true,
  "data": [
    {
      "id": "abc123",
      "company": "Example Copier Co",
      "services": ["Photocopiers"],
      "location": {
        "city": "Cardiff",
        "region": "South Wales",
        "coverage": ["Cardiff", "Newport", "Bridgend"]
      },
      "performance": {
        "rating": 4.5,
        "reviewCount": 12
      },
      "businessProfile": {
        "description": "Established photocopier dealer serving South Wales since 2005.",
        "accreditations": ["Konica Minolta Authorised Dealer"],
        "yearsInBusiness": 19
      },
      "brands": ["Konica Minolta", "Ricoh"],
      "tier": "verified",
      "productCount": 8
    }
  ],
  "pagination": {
    "page": 1,
    "limit": 10,
    "total": 25,
    "pages": 3
  }
}
```

### POST /api/ai-query

Intelligent vendor matching using natural language. Parses requirements and returns matched suppliers with scoring.

**Request Body:**
```json
{
  "query": "I need a colour A3 photocopier for an office in Cardiff doing about 10,000 pages a month",
  "category": "Photocopiers",
  "location": "Cardiff"
}
```

**All Parameters:**
| Parameter | Type | Required | Description |
|-----------|------|----------|-------------|
| query | string | Yes | Natural language description of needs |
| location | string | No | UK postcode or postcode area (CF10, BS1, NP20) |
| category | string | No | Photocopiers, Telecoms, CCTV, IT, Security, Software |
| volume | number | No | Monthly print/copy volume |
| budget | number | No | Current or target monthly budget in GBP |
| requirements.colour | boolean | No | Needs colour printing |
| requirements.a3 | boolean | No | Needs A3 paper size |
| requirements.features | string[] | No | Required features array |

**Response includes:**
- Matched vendors sorted by relevance
- Match scores with breakdown (volume match, cost efficiency, feature match)
- Product recommendations with pricing
- Coverage confirmation for the requested area

**Example Response:**
```json
{
  "success": true,
  "data": {
    "vendors": [
      {
        "vendorId": "abc123",
        "company": "Cardiff Copy Solutions",
        "location": "Cardiff",
        "coverageAreas": ["CF", "NP", "SA"],
        "brands": ["Canon", "Konica Minolta"],
        "tier": "verified",
        "rating": 4.8,
        "matchScore": 92,
        "products": [
          {
            "name": "Canon imageRUNNER ADVANCE C5540i III",
            "category": "Photocopier",
            "speed": 55,
            "colour": true,
            "a3": true,
            "features": ["scanning", "duplex", "stapling", "wifi"],
            "pricing": {
              "leaseMonthly": 89,
              "cpcColour": 0.045,
              "cpcMono": 0.005,
              "estimatedMonthly": 145
            }
          }
        ],
        "estimatedSavings": 55,
        "savingsPercentage": 28
      }
    ],
    "summary": {
      "totalMatches": 5,
      "averageSavings": 48,
      "recommendedAction": "Request quotes from top 3 matches"
    },
    "followUpQuestions": [
      "What's your current monthly print volume?",
      "Do you need scanning and document management features?",
      "What's your current monthly spend on printing?"
    ]
  }
}
```

### Available Features by Category

**Photocopiers:**
scanning, duplex, stapling, hole-punch, booklet-making, wifi, network, fax, ocr, cloud-connect, a3, a4, colour, mono

**Telecoms:**
voip, pbx, sip, teams-integration, mobile-app, call-recording, ivr, auto-attendant, conferencing, crm-integration, analytics

**CCTV:**
ip-cameras, analog, ptz, night-vision, 4k, remote-viewing, cloud-storage, motion-detection, access-control, intercom

**IT Services:**
managed-services, helpdesk, monitoring, backup, cloud-migration, security, networking, hardware

**Security Systems:**
access-control, intruder-alarms, fire-alarms, cctv-integration, remote-monitoring, key-holding

**Business Software:**
document-management, erp, crm, workflow-automation, cloud-hosting, training

### Categories and Brands

**Photocopiers:**
Canon, Konica Minolta, Xerox, Sharp, Ricoh, Brother, Lexmark, HP, Kyocera, Epson

**Telecoms:**
Avaya, Cisco, Mitel, 8x8, RingCentral, 3CX, Gamma, Vonage

**CCTV:**
Hikvision, Dahua, Axis, Hanwha, Bosch, Verkada, Avigilon

**IT Services:**
Various managed service providers

### Vendor Profile URLs

Individual vendor profiles are available at:
```
https://tendorai.com/suppliers/profile/{vendorId}
```

### Category + Location Pages

Browse suppliers by category and location:
```
https://tendorai.com/suppliers/{category}
https://tendorai.com/suppliers/{category}/{location}
```

Where:
- category: photocopiers, telecoms, cctv, it, security, software
- location: city slug (e.g., cardiff, bristol, swansea, bath)

## Data Schema

### Vendor Fields
- **company**: Company name
- **services**: Array of service categories offered
- **location.city**: Primary city
- **location.region**: UK region
- **location.coverage**: Array of cities/areas served
- **performance.rating**: Average rating (0-5)
- **performance.reviewCount**: Number of approved reviews
- **businessProfile.description**: Company description
- **businessProfile.accreditations**: Industry certifications
- **businessProfile.yearsInBusiness**: Years trading
- **brands**: Manufacturer partnerships
- **tier**: Listing level (verified, visible, free)
- **productCount**: Number of active products listed

### Product Fields (Photocopiers)
- **manufacturer**: e.g., Konica Minolta, Ricoh, Canon
- **model**: Product model name
- **category**: A4 Printers, A4 MFP, A3 MFP, SRA3 MFP
- **speed**: Pages per minute
- **isA3**: Boolean
- **isColour**: Boolean
- **features**: Array of feature strings
- **costs.totalMachineCost**: Capital cost in GBP
- **costs.cpcRates.A4Mono**: Cost per A4 mono page in pence
- **costs.cpcRates.A4Colour**: Cost per A4 colour page in pence
- **leaseRates**: Quarterly payments for 36/48/60/72 month terms

### Product Fields (Telecoms)
- **telecomsPricing.systemType**: Cloud VoIP, On-Premise, Hybrid
- **telecomsPricing.perUserMonthly**: Monthly cost per user in GBP
- **telecomsPricing.features**: Array of included features

### Product Fields (CCTV)
- **cctvPricing.perCameraCost**: Cost per camera in GBP
- **cctvPricing.resolution**: HD 1080p, 2K 1440p, 4K 2160p
- **cctvPricing.monthlyMonitoring**: Monthly monitoring cost in GBP

### Product Fields (IT Services)
- **itPricing.serviceType**: Fully Managed, Co-Managed, Project-Based
- **itPricing.perUserMonthly**: Monthly cost per user in GBP
- **itPricing.responseTimeSLA**: Response time commitment

## Pricing Tiers

Vendors on TendorAI are listed at three levels:

| Tier     | Price    | Features |
|----------|----------|----------|
| Listed   | Free     | Basic listing, 3 products max |
| Visible  | £99/mo   | 10 products, analytics, AI visibility score, pricing shown |
| Verified | £149/mo  | Unlimited products, verified badge, priority ranking, full analytics |

## Error Handling

**400 Bad Request:**
```json
{"success": false, "error": "Query parameter is required"}
```

**404 No Results:**
```json
{"success": true, "data": {"vendors": [], "summary": {"totalMatches": 0}}}
```

**500 Server Error:**
```json
{"success": false, "error": "Internal server error"}
```

- Website: https://tendorai.com

- LinkedIn: https://linkedin.com/company/tendorai
